archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1443
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to have confidence that tens of thousands of customers can access and redeem rewards at the same time and recevie a great experience (e.g. a high demand pre-sale)

properties.value: [CLM] CLM support high volume of loyalty transactions per second, details to be agreed during environment scalling process. Access to Self service?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
